languages.text: "Но ты — не тот человек, что может побороть эту беду. И даже если ты справишься — ты сам{mf||а} можешь обернуться бедой. В тебе нет света и желания беречь, и потому мы решили, что не должны дальше тебе помогать".

"But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."
languages.original_text: "Но ты — не тот человек, что может побороть эту беду. И даже если ты справишься — ты сам{mf||а} можешь обернуться бедой. В тебе нет света и желания беречь, и потому мы решили, что не должны дальше тебе помогать".

traits.locale_text: "But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

"But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

"But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

"But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

languages.text: 「けれどあなたは災害を退けることができる人ではない。もしできたとしても、あなた自身が次の災害となる。あなたの中には光もなければ、守りたいという気持ちもない。だから、我々はこれ以上あなたを助けるべきではないと決めた」
languages.original_text: "But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

traits.locale_text: 「けれどあなたは災害を退けることができる人ではない。もしできたとしても、あなた自身が次の災害となる。あなたの中には光もなければ、守りたいという気持ちもない。だから、我々はこれ以上あなたを助けるべきではないと決めた」

languages.text: “但你无法战胜这场灾难。就算你真的战胜了这场灾难，你也可能会成为下一场灾难的起源。你内心没有光明，也没有保护他人的渴望，因此我们决定不再帮助你了。”
languages.original_text: "But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

traits.locale_text: “但你无法战胜这场灾难。就算你真的战胜了这场灾难，你也可能会成为下一场灾难的起源。你内心没有光明，也没有保护他人的渴望，因此我们决定不再帮助你了。”

languages.text: "Doch Ihr seid niemand, der die Katastrophe verhindern kann. Und selbst wenn Ihr es tut, werdet Ihr vielleicht zur nächsten Katastrophe. Es liegt kein Licht in Euch, kein Wunsch zu beschützen. Daher haben wir entschieden, dass wir Euch nicht länger helfen sollten."
languages.original_text: "But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

traits.locale_text: "Doch Ihr seid niemand, der die Katastrophe verhindern kann. Und selbst wenn Ihr es tut, werdet Ihr vielleicht zur nächsten Katastrophe. Es liegt kein Licht in Euch, kein Wunsch zu beschützen. Daher haben wir entschieden, dass wir Euch nicht länger helfen sollten."

languages.text: « Mais vous n'êtes pas en mesure de déjouer cette catastrophe. Même si vous y parveniez, vous pourriez bien devenir la prochaine calamité. Il n'y a aucune lumière en vous, aucune volonté de protéger les vôtres, c'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de ne plus vous aider. »
languages.original_text: "But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

traits.locale_text: « Mais vous n'êtes pas en mesure de déjouer cette catastrophe. Même si vous y parveniez, vous pourriez bien devenir la prochaine calamité. Il n'y a aucune lumière en vous, aucune volonté de protéger les vôtres, c'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de ne plus vous aider. »

languages.text: «Pero usted no está {mf|capacitado|capacitada} para evitar el desastre. Incluso aunque lo consiguiera, sus actos mismos podrían acarrear el siguiente desastre. Usted carece de luz, de deseo de proteger; y por este motivo hemos decidido que ya no le ayudaremos más».
languages.original_text: "But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

traits.locale_text: «Pero usted no está {mf|capacitado|capacitada} para evitar el desastre. Incluso aunque lo consiguiera, sus actos mismos podrían acarrear el siguiente desastre. Usted carece de luz, de deseo de proteger; y por este motivo hemos decidido que ya no le ayudaremos más».

languages.text: "Ancak siz, bu felaketin önüne geçemezsiniz. Geçmeyi başarsanız dahi bizzat sonraki felaket olabilirsiniz. Yüreğinizde hiç ışık yok, koruma arzusu da yok. Bu yüzden size daha fazla yardım etmeme kararı aldık."
languages.original_text: "But you are not someone who can defeat the disaster. Even if you do, you might become the next disaster. There is no light in you, no desire to protect, and for this reason, we have decided that we should not help you any longer."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak siz, bu felaketin önüne geçemezsiniz. Geçmeyi başarsanız dahi bizzat sonraki felaket olabilirsiniz. Yüreğinizde hiç ışık yok, koruma arzusu da yok. Bu yüzden size daha fazla yardım etmeme kararı aldık."
